member.name: TCP_TABLE_CLASS
member.summary: The TCP_TABLE_CLASS enumeration defines the set of values used to indicate the type of table returned by calls to .

member.name: TCP_TABLE_CLASS.TCP_TABLE_BASIC_LISTENER
member.summary: A table that contains all listening (receiving only) TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.

member.name: TCP_TABLE_CLASS.TCP_TABLE_BASIC_CONNECTIONS
member.summary: A table that contains all connected TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.

member.name: TCP_TABLE_CLASS.TCP_TABLE_BASIC_ALL
member.summary: A table that contains all TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.

member.name: TCP_TABLE_CLASS.TCP_TABLE_OWNER_PID_LISTENER
member.summary: A or that contains all listening (receiving only) TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.

member.name: TCP_TABLE_CLASS.TCP_TABLE_OWNER_PID_CONNECTIONS
member.summary: A or that structure that contains all connected TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.

member.name: TCP_TABLE_CLASS.TCP_TABLE_OWNER_PID_ALL
member.summary: A or structure that contains all TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.

member.name: TCP_TABLE_CLASS.TCP_TABLE_OWNER_MODULE_LISTENER
member.summary: A or structure that contains all listening (receiving only) TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.

member.name: TCP_TABLE_CLASS.TCP_TABLE_OWNER_MODULE_CONNECTIONS
member.summary: A or structure that contains all connected TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.

member.name: TCP_TABLE_CLASS.TCP_TABLE_OWNER_MODULE_ALL
member.summary: A or structure that contains all TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.
